column4: Could somebody please tell me what i am doing wrong on installing adobe flash player!?
yeah but then you lose the compositing :P
if the user has permission, then EVERY SINGLE program on the computer has permission, which would be very very bad :P
www.scion.com seems to load up to 80% and then stop :/
this is such a crappy website that i cant even begin to describe how crappy it is
yeah, except that all the content is in flash...
which completely eliminates all benefit you get from using the latest standards
and also, they are missing an <XML> tag from the start :P
what a pile of crap...its in FLASH
obviously its not very good at all since it doesnt appear to work in ubuntu / firefox
on the other hand, my own website works in everything, so therefore it must be better than theirs :P
a real web developer is not content with his site working in "MOST" browsers...it should work in EVERYTHING
it opens fine in internet explorer in ubuntu
oh wait...apparently not
well, looks like it doesnt work in ubuntu at all
ah! seriously!
yeah, i tried IE and it does the same thing
what could we/ubuntu be missing?...... theres something that we dont have that IE has.
its not our fault, its their own fault for making a non-compatible website
but we should be able to adapt well enough to take in those screw ups just as Windows and Mac does.
the problem is that they are designed FOR windows, since its the most popular, so you won't see any problems if you just use IE in windows since the whole web is pretty much made for it
yes!  it pisses me off daily, as a web developer, having to design for IE
ill show you what he means, system>preferences>sessions> new
well you figure out what it is from a shortcut, usually
